settings.heading: Product Description
settings.content:
Our pre-workout is scientifically formulated to give you an energy boost ensuring you’re primed for peak performance

Sharpen your mental game with heightened focus and concentration. WANTED keeps your mind in the zone, helping you conquer every set and rep with unparalleled precision

Experience skin tearing muscle pumps. WANTED promotes increased blood flow to your muscles, enhancing your overall performance

Train like a true protagonist with enhanced endurance and stamina. WANTED helps delay fatigue, allowing you to train harder & longer, whether you’re powering through intense cardio or lifting heavy weights

Indulge your taste buds with tropical Asian flavors. Each sip of WANTED will take you on a flavor adventure

With a fully transparent formula, we don’t use any proprietary blends

Designed for anime fans, gym rats, and anyone else looking for pump, focus, energy & growth

settings.heading: Flavor Description
settings.content:
Lychee: Sweet and fragrant, with a slightly tart undertone. The taste is a harmonious blend of floral and tropical notes

Dragonfruit Lemonade: A burst of tropical sweetness complemented by the zesty kick of lemonade & the refreshing essence of dragon fruit

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
• L-Citrulline: 4500mg/scoop | 9000mg/2 scoops
  • Beta-Alanine: 1600mg/scoop | 3200mg/2 scoops
  • Glycerpump™: 1500mg/scoop | 3000mg/2 scoops
  • Malic Acid: 600mg/scoop | 1200mg/2 scoops
  • Betaine Anhydrous: 1250mg/scoop | 2500mg/2 scoops
  • L-Tyrosine: 750mg/scoop | 1500mg/2 scoops
  • Agmatine Sulfate: 500mg/scoop | 1000mg/2 scoops
  • Caffeine Anhydrous: 150mg/scoop | 300mg/2 scoops
  • Huperzine A (Huperzia Serrata Leaf Standardized Extract): 100mcg/scoop | 200mcg/2 scoops
  • N-Phenethyl Dimethylamine Citrate: 100mg/scoop | 200mg/2 scoops
  • Bioperine® (Black Pepper Fruit Extract) (Standardized 95% Piperine): 5mg/scoop | 10mg/2 scoops

settings.heading: How to take
settings.content: As a dietary supplement, mix 1-2 scoops of Wanted pre-workout in 8-10 ounces of water and consume 30 minutes prior to training. Vary amount of liquid to taste. New users may wish to assess tolerance with ½ scoop

settings.heading: FAQs
settings.content:
How do I take Wanted pre-workout?

Take one (1) or two (2) scoop(s) of Wanted pre-workout about 30 minutes before your workout. New users may wish to assess tolerance with ½ scoop

How much caffeine does Wanted pre-workout contain?

One (1) scoop contains 150mg of caffeine. Two (2) scoops contain 300mg of caffeine

Does Wanted pre-workout clump?

Due to the very high concentration of ingredients in Wanted pre-workout, clumping of the powder is common. However, this does not affect the quality of the supplement. Simply break up the clumps and enjoy the results
